CustomField.description: The total amount of the underwrite provided by Standard Bank. Underwrite implies providing more than the bank intends to hold.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The total amount of the underwrite provided by Standard Bank. Underwrite implies providing more than the bank intends to hold. If the transaction is not an underwrite, but merely a participation or bilateral, then do not fill any amount in this field.
CustomField.label: Underwrite Amount
